learning.title: Currently Learning
learning.description: Expanding my skills in <highlight>Rust</highlight> and <highlight>Next.js</highlight>, exploring modern web development and systems programming.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Specialized in <highlight>Java</highlight> development with years of experience building robust applications and contributing to open-source projects.

items.title: Senior Software Developer
items.description: Led development of multiple high-impact projects using Java and modern web technologies. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions. Mentored junior developers and contributed to architectural decisions.

items.title: Full Stack Developer
items.description: Built and maintained full-stack applications using React and Node.js. Implemented CI/CD pipelines and improved deployment processes. Worked closely with product team to define technical requirements and deliver features on time.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my open-source contributions and personal projects

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What colleagues and clients say about working with me

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.quote: Tim is an exceptional developer who consistently delivers high-quality code. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills make him a valuable asset to any team.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.quote: Working with Tim has been a pleasure. He brings innovative solutions to complex problems and is always willing to help team members grow their skills.

items.name: Emma Williams
items.quote: Tim's expertise in Java and modern web technologies helped us scale our platform efficiently. His code is clean, well-documented, and maintainable.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.responsibleTitle: Responsible for content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV
imprint.liabilityContent: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with general legislation pursuant to Section 7 (1) of the German Telemedia Act (TMG). However, according to Sections 8 to 10 TMG, we are not obligated as a service provider to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
imprint.liabilityLinks: Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot accept any liability for this third-party content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.
imprint.copyright: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The reproduction, editing, distribution and any kind of use outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

cookies.title: Cookie Consent
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to our use of cookies.
cookies.essentialDesc: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.
cookies.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: This privacy policy explains how your personal data is processed when you visit this website.

general.title: 2. General Information
general.text: This website is a personal portfolio for professional presentation as a software engineer. Personal data is processed only as necessary to operate this site (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).

logs.title: 3. Access Data and Logs
logs.text: When visiting this website, the server automatically records log files (IP address, timestamp, browser type, OS, requested page). These are kept for up to 7 days for security reasons and then deleted.

cloudflare.title: 4. Use of Cloudflare
cloudflare.pre: This website is delivered through a
cloudflare.provider: Cloudflare, Inc., 101 Townsend St, San Francisco, CA 94107, USA
cloudflare.text: Cloudflare processes technical connection data (e.g. IP addresses) to deliver and secure the website. Processing is based on a legitimate interest in secure and efficient operation (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR).

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.text: If you contact me by email, your data will be stored for the purpose of handling the request. Your data will not be shared with third parties.

rights.title: 6. Data Subject Rights
rights.text: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, restrict, or object to processing, and to data portability under Articles 15–21 GDPR. You may also lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

nocookies.title: 7. No Cookies or Tracking
nocookies.text: This website uses no cookies, analytics, or social media plugins.

changes.title: 8. Changes
changes.text: This privacy policy may be updated if technical or legal changes occur. The latest version will always be available on this page.
